ニャー.definition:
Meow, [also known as] nya, in [japanese] [written] correctly.
ネコ: ニャー
(neko)

ニュース.definition:
ニュース nyūsu or niyusu (sounds nuse, not newz) is the katakana [expression] for a ([government] or commercial) PR article or TV show by Japanese media.

Technicaly, buy-us-ed. messages from the sponsors, basically made up from recycled refillable [materials], if not saiko!logical.

* should not be confused with ニューズ nyūzu (lt. news) which mistakenly mixed up quite often.
ニュース.example: ニュース ゼロ news zero is a [Japanese] late-night [talk show] broadcast live from JOAX-DTV (NNN-keiretsu Nippon TV), though [I don't think] it's funny at all.
